description:
This amazing app points you toward weekly sales at your local supermarkets and discount stores. Download Grocery Pal today and find savings from stores such as SAFEWAY, CVS/pharmacy, Walmart, Walgreens, RiteAid, Target, ALDI, Kmart, Dollar General, Family Dollar, Albertsons, H-E-B, Harris Teeter, any many many more!

——————————————————————

From New York Times (Dec 26, 2010)

"Apps like Grocery Pal can show digital coupons for items on your list..."

——————————————————————

Quotes from our users:

"Best app for my kitchen since my first microwave oven!"

"First app that allows me to compare prices from all my local grocery stores!"

——————————————————————

Features:

● Browse weekly savings at local supermarkets and chain stores
● Add sale items to shopping list and track them easily
● Compare prices across multiple stores
● Redeem coupons at hundres of thousands of stores
● Organize list items into aisles and categories
● Create as many lists as you want
● Build lists fast from over a million brands & products
● Sync lists between mobile devices or browsers
● Share lists with others in realtime
● Send lists via Email or SMS texting
● Restore all your lists when switching device (account registration required)

——————————————————————

You can browse weekly sales from stores like Wal-Mart, Target, Rite-Aid, Kmart, Dollar General, Family Dollar, Food Lion, ALDI, SAFEWAY, CVS/pharmacy, Albertsons, Stop & Shop, HEB (H-E-B), Super Target, VONS, BI-LO, Giant Eagle, Harris Teeter, Ingles Markets, Jewel, Hannaford, Shaw's, Giant Food, Tops, Fred Meyer, C-Town, Acme, Price Chopper, Sweetbay, A&P, Pathmark, DOMINICK'S, Lucky Supermarket, Cub Foods, Bashas' Supermarket, TOM THUMB, Waldbaums, Bartell Drugs, RANDALLS, Food City, Save Mart, PAVILIONS, Sprout's, GIANT, GENUARDI'S, Hy-Vee, Dierbergs and many many more. (Please visit our website to see if individual stores are supported.)

——————————————————————

Printable Coupons:  Email, Print and SAVE! 

Grocery Pal offers a wide variety of printable manufacturer coupons that can be redeemed in most of stores across the US.  You can browse these coupons by category and make your selections easily. When you're ready, simply press a button to email all the coupons and click on the link in the email to print!

——————————————————————

Feel like using a physical keyboard? No problem! Just login to your account on our web portal at www.twicular.com. You can create and manage your lists in a browser and get them automatically synchronized with your iOS device!
trackCensoredName: Grocery Pal (In-store weekly savings, sales, coupons & shopping list for Walmart, Walgreens, Costco, Kmart)
trackName: Grocery Pal (In-store weekly savings, sales, coupons & shopping list for Walmart, Walgreens, Costco, Kmart)
releaseNotes:
- All new support for iOS7 UI style
- Shopping list item sorting in alphabetical order
- Hide unwanted aisles
- Support for more stores and sales
- Performance enhancements
- Various other fixes
